Package controllers

Class StaffMainLayoutController

java.lang.Object
controllers.StaffMainLayoutController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientAware, StageAware
public class StaffMainLayoutController extends Object implements ClientAware, StageAware
Main layout for staff users (Attendant / Manager). Displays a fixed top bar and side menu. Swaps the center pane using loadScreen().
